about_the_game:
Synopsis:
Once destroyed by the kobolds of the home of the two sisters in the grown-up, in order to find out the truth of the year through the story

Main Character:Sakori

A sunny and cheerful new girl knight, petite in stature, Sharaiya's younger sister.
Specializes in using short swords and daggers, and has a flexible fighting style.
Although she has the courage to challenge evil, she lacks caution and can be sloppy at times, and is prone to falling down in various places.


Main Supporting Character: Sharia

A cold and beautiful knight leader, with a full figure, the strongest meat shield in the kingdom, is both Sakori's sister and Sakori's superior.
She is a hero in the eyes of the people of the kingdom, with her heavy sword that can destroy all enemies in a single blow.
Although her character is calm and upright, she is occasionally overly confident in her own strength and displays an arrogant side.


Game Features:
*Classic turn-based RPG
* A lot of text, rich subplots, the main plot of the three kinds of endings
*CG performance contains a little animation elements (only a little)
*Depending on the character's current state (exposed/in heat), there will be different drawings and performances when talking to NPCs.
*Simple and practical




Tags: evil corruption hypnosis drugs prostitution ahegao ohogao
Basic CG Count: 40+ Total CG Count: 600+
Estimated Game Duration: 3h+
No CVs, Human Voices
No Memory Mode.



**Note.
*This game contains a lot of restricted images, please do not play in public.
*This game does not have a memory mode, and some of the episodes cannot be rewatched after passing the level.
*This game contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages, including the following: Sexual Content and describution，extreme violence，drug used
player of this game are 18 years of age or older.


NOTE: This game is not available in English, we are sorry for that (we plan to make an English version in the future)

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages, including the following: Sexual Content and describution,extreme violence,drug used,alcohol abuse,tentacles,sexual assault/non-consensual sex,BDSM,Body Transformation,SM
